page.title: 02Parcyperson farm,Llwyndrain.
page.content: Parcyperson farm is a mile from Llwyndrain hamlet.It is a 55 acre dairy farm.We milk 23 friesian cows at half past six in the morning and in the evening at five o'clock.We have 6 calves and we feed them with milk morning and evening.We have 2 Massey Ferguson tractors.We keep 15 bullocks on rented land in Hebron.At Parcyperson we have 4 sheds and we keep calves,tractors and hay in them.In winter we keep the cows in at night.My mother helps to milk the cows and to feed the friesian and charolais calves.At the moment we are very busy haymaking.My mother likes dogs.We have 8 on the farm,3 King Charles Spaniels,1 Chow Chow,2 Pekingese and one Welsh Corgi.When I grow up I would like to farm Parcyperson with my father.That is my ambition.
